name: PowerPanel2
short_description:
This Is Power Panel from habbox I just re-edited making It better If there Is any Issues with It let me know. 
Some of the stuff added were a new secured login, firewall protection, cache and timeout session.  

I also may add some more features In the near future.

This Script Is perfect for Radio Stations.

Power Panel is a sleek and easy to use Panel, although it may not be very colourful it certainly does the job well. With loads of features and the unique bonus of an added Forum, PowerPanel will serve your DJing needs suitably. You can tell PowerPanel is primarily for Habbo Fansites as it has the added feature of a Habbo Spotlight. This is where a User enters their name and their Habbo Player pops up somewhere on your site.

PowerPanel has 4 Usergroups; Trialist DJ, Regular DJ, Senior DJ and Administrator.

P.S. I DON'T KNOW HOW TO UPLOAD I'M CONFUSED.
